quest.name: Barking Up the Right Tree
journal:
 Quest Sync
Harvene is dreading her next journey into the woods.
objectives: Deliver the peeling bark to Harvene.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Ah, you are one of Master Matoya's guests, are you not? Perhaps you can assist me.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: To the west of here, in Lake Tusi Mek'ta, sits a tree which cradles an enormous crystal─Fruit of the Protector. It is said to have existed even before the empire of Ronka.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: I require the bark from this tree and I would ask you to retrieve it for me.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: I must make dye for our clothes, you see, and it is a most vital ingredient.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: As you might expect, eaters and all manner of beasts are drawn to its power. Were the woods not so rife with danger I would go myself.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Please say you will help. I require but four pieces of bark to finish my work.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Do be careful when peeling the bark, lest you damage the tree.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned. Were you able to reach the tree?

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Thank you, misssir, thank you! I realize it looks like ordinary bark at a glance, but it makes for such wondrous colors when properly ground and mixed.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Garments dyed using the bark from that tree are said to be blessed by the Protector, you know.

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: Mark my words: every guard in Slitherbough will be dressed from head to toe in clothes using my dye. Perhaps even the children and the elderly!

dialogue.name: HARVENE
dialogue.text: I better set to boiling this bark. If you'll excuse me.
